nodes.text: Combat Tactics: Rebel Field Manual was a Rebel Alliance document authored by Sergeant Ruescott Melshi of the Rebel Alliance Special Forces during the early rebellion against the Galactic Empire. The manual discussed guerrilla warfare tactics and included in-depth descriptions of various stormtrooper variants of the Galactic Empire. The document was later included in The Rebel Files, a collection of Alliance documents that was discovered in 34 ABY.
